com.dotmarketing.scripting.util

Class BSFUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dotmarketing.scripting.util.BSFUtil

  • public class BSFUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods that make it easier to use the BSF Within dotCMS Scripting Plugin.
    Author:
    Jason Tesser
